sys_ui_script.description:
The K16 AngularJS Incident Manager Model
Contents: - An initialization method that constructs all of the variables and objects for our controller. The initialize method returns 'this' to our controller, allowing the controller to reference all of the variables and methods available in the service. Since the controller is referencing the service, any changes made in the service will be reflected in the controller, and subsequently, the view. - A method to remove the current search, and show all Incident records - A method to retrieve the Incident list data, using the scripted web service. This methods sets the records, dashboard data, and list total using a promise.
sys_ui_script.name: sn_k16_im.k16.incident_manager.model
